name: FNF B-side Minus Mod
description:
THE MOD CREATORS HAVE FULL PERMISION TO TAKE THIS DOWN

This mod is completely free, I made it this way so the mod creators don't lose any money, depending on the computer it may not work

Im probably not going to update this mod at all anymore, ive lost my motavation and need to focus on more important life choices.

This is a fusion between the Minus Mod and B-side Mod which was made off of the amazing game Friday Night Funkin!

I made week 6 all on my own.

To Get Lemon Demon go to this video and follow the steps:

**WARNING** Lemon Demon in this mod is way scarier beware.
